title: September 19, 20
content: SATURDAY at 4:30  HUMANITY SATURDAY  Saturday church was hopping this past week, with close to 50 in attendance, and some 14 children in Saturday School! This Saturday Christie’s theme will center around our role as caretakers of planet earth. Stay after for a Pizza Party, as we celebrate Family School Scholarship Weekend.         SUNDAY at 10:00  FAMILY SCHOOL SCHOLARSHIP SUNDAY  Sunday we will be considering the night sky, the billions of billions of stars, the possibility of living like shining stars, and the chance to celebrate scholarships for students at the Family School.
source: West Parish of Barnstable, United Church of Christ
